title: Simulation Training Design for Central Venous Catheter Insertion Procedures: GEL vs. ELT Comparison

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Anatomical Knowledge and Clinical Practice Experience
context.additional_context: Simulation-based educational environments using personal devices, with project-based assessments applied.

learning_goals: A 15% improvement in overall procedural checklist scores for central venous catheter insertion after simulation training with the GEL model.
A 20%+ higher pass rate after training completion with the GEL model compared to the ELT model.
A 15%+ reduction in critical behavioral error rates with the GEL model compared to ELT.

resources: Step-by-step checklist and error analysis template
Video recording and feedback tool guidelines

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
